video_identification.title: Webinar: The Humanitarian Catastrophe in Gaza with UNRWA

extracted_metadata.title: Webinar: The Humanitarian Catastrophe in Gaza with UNRWA
extracted_metadata.description: On Sunday, July 14th of 2024 the Green Olive Collective joined with UNRWA Director of Planning Sam Rose shortly after he left Khan Yunis in Gaza to discuss current humanitarian conditions, the imperative of aid, the engineered famine, and infrastructure failure. Sam provided an analysis of the conditions on the ground and discussed the urgent need for a political solution. This recording of the webinar is free and open to the public, but you can become a member of the Green Olive Collective at the following link to sustain our work to challenge the violence of occupation and advocate for a democratic future: https://members.greenolivecollective....
